name: Astral Realm
description:
The astral plane, also called the astral world, is a plane of existence postulated by classical (particularly neo-Platonic), medieval, oriental, and esoteric philosophies and mystery religions. It is the world of the celestial spheres, crossed by the soul in its astral bodyon the way to being born and after death, and is generally believed to be populated by angels, spirits or other immaterial beings. In the late 19th and early 20th century the term was popularised by Theosophy and neo-Rosicrucianism.

In short it is another dimension where people are when they die... You can go there while you still alive... You just need to learn how to when you sleep or awake.. We go there everynight when we sleep.. We just don't remember the journey when we wake up...
